name: v0.3.0
body:
## News
* Minimum C++ standard: C++17
* [CMake](https://cmake.org/) support
  * Autotools support is removed.
* Improved performance
* Interface updates
  * Movable `marisa::Trie`
  * Copyable and movable `marisa::Agent`
  * `MARISA_MAP_POPULATE` for `marisa::Trie::mmap()`
* [Clang-Format](https://clang.llvm.org/docs/ClangFormat.html) settings

## What's Changed
* Copy more efficiently in Vector::realloc. by @gsivek in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/26
* KeySet::push_back: Use memcpy to copy by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/30
* configure.ac: Add --enable-asan option by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/62
* configure.ac: Add --enable-gperftools-profiler by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/63
* scoped_ptr/array -> std::unique_ptr by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/64
* Add a GitHub Workflow to run tests by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/65
* Use default copy constructor and copy-assignment by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/66
* vector-test: Delete duplicate TestPopCount() call by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/67
* Make `Agent` copyable and moveable by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/38
* Enable Trie::mmap() to use MAP_POPULATE by @s-yata in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/68
* Add CMake support by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/69
* Mark Trie move as noexcept by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/70
* vector.h: fix a few clang-tidy warnings by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/71
* Run tests on mac OS and ubuntu 22.04 by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/72
* Remove autoconf and vs2019 by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/73
* Add ifdef for MAP_POPULATE by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/74
* Fix Agent copy for predictive search by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/77
* Use std::popcount and __builtin_popcount if available by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/78
* cmake: Fix ENABLE_NATIVE_BUILD by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/80
* Optimize select_bit by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/52
* Add and use .clang-format by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/82
* Enable MARISA_MAP_POPULATE on FreeBSD and Windows by @s-yata in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/83
* Use C++11 features by @s-yata in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/84
* Use in-class initializers by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/85
* Use C++17 features by @s-yata in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/87
* PopCount::count: Rename to popcount by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/88
* vector: Assume T is trivially copyable and destructible by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/89
* CMake: Fix header install by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/91
* Add a clang-format GitHub workflow by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/94
* CMake: Bring back marisa.pc.in by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/95
* cmake: force to build a static library from cmdopt.cc by @s-yata in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/96
* State: Use `std::vector` by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/97
* Remove clang warnings by @s-yata in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/101
* Add more missed in-class initializers by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/102
* Remove Algorithm class and algorithm.h by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/104
* Enable dependabot to keep github actions up-to-date (#103) by @s-yata in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/106
* windows.yml: Depend on actions/checkout hash by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/105

## New Contributors
* @gsivek made their first contribution in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/26

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/compare/v0.2.7...v0.3.0

name: marisa-trie v0.2.7
body:
## What's Changed
* remove extra semicolon by @Karry in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/25
* select_bit: Extract 32-bit non-SSE2 version by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/29
* BitVector::build_index: 100x speedup by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/28
* Add string_view getters and setters by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/27
* Use MARISA_DEBUG_IF in scoped-*.h as opposed to MARISA_THROW_IF by @tony-mak in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/32
* marisa-build: Change long arg name to --num-tries by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/48
* Use (0 - x) instead of (~x - 1) for -x by @jmr in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/34
* Fix detection of MARISA_WORD_SIZE by @ncopa in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/58

## New Contributors
* @Karry made their first contribution in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/25
* @jmr made their first contribution in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/29
* @tony-mak made their first contribution in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/32
* @ncopa made their first contribution in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/58

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/compare/v0.2.6...v0.2.7

name: marisa-trie v0.2.6
body:
Source code with a configure script:  [marisa-0.2.6.tar.gz](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/20224031/marisa-0.2.6.tar.gz)

Note that you can generate the configure script by `autoreconf -i`.

## What's Changed
* Fix `swap` overload by @glebm in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/20
* Auto check SSE availability and new option to enable all of them by @jakwings in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/12

## New Contributors
* @glebm made their first contribution in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/20
* @jakwings made their first contribution in https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/pull/12

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/s-yata/marisa-trie/compare/v0.2.5...v0.2.6
